name: Tori (itch) (Galih, willsongan, 田中麻里子, enricoanderson, Suyatna, Skyleaft, cathean, yolandaoctaviane)
name_original: Tori (itch) (Galih, willsongan, 田中麻里子, enricoanderson, Suyatna, Skyleaft, cathean, yolandaoctaviane)
description: Enhance Tori's body with superpower injection and help Tori escape from an underground experimental site created by Dr. Eddy. But, remember every power comes with a cost!
